text: Rezzano-NicosiaStatuto comunale di Calci, Art. 4. is a village in Tuscany, central Italy, administratively a frazione of the comune of Calci, province of Pisa. The village is composed by the two hamlets of Nicosia and Rezzano. It is about 12 km from Pisa and 1 km from the municipal seat of La Pieve. == References == == Bibliography == * Category:Frazioni of the Province of Pisa
title: Rezzano-Nicosia
